title: Enhancing Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Online Micro-Suturing Surgical Skill Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic surgical tool usage and understanding of anatomy
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain micro-suturing surgical procedures step-by-step with 80% accuracy
Learners can demonstrate suturing skills scoring at least 4 out of 5 points consecutively three times on a rubber glove model
Learners can simulate surgical procedures for 30 minutes through mental practice

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
